channel.title: Stocks on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Stocks on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: simple Filter Stocks
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Go to Catalog stocks Page Page title contains : stocks * number of element in grid > 0 filter by name Criteria : ‘Hummingbird printed t-shirt’ number of element in grid after filter < total of element in grid all element in grid column name contains ‘Hummingbird printed t-shirt’ reset filter number of element in grid after reset = total of element in grid filter by reference Criteria : demo_1 number of element in grid after filter < total of element in grid

item.title: Update Quantity by setting input
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Go to catalog Stocks Title contains ‘Stocks *' Number of element in grid > 0 Filter by name Criteria : ‘Mountain fox - Vector graphics’ Number of element in grid < Total of elements in grid First row column name = ‘Mountain fox - Vector graphics’ Add Quantity by setting input value Criteria : 5 Successful update message is displayed : ‘Stock successfully updated’

item.title: Bulk Edit Quantity With Input
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Go to catalog Stocks Title contains ‘Stocks *' Number of element in grid > 0 Filter by name Criteria : ‘Mountain fox notebook’ Number of element in grid < Total of elements in grid In all rows, column name = ‘Mountain fox notebook’ Enter 100 in bulk input quantity and click on apply new quantities Successful message : Stock successfully updated

item.title: Filter Stocks By Status
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Go to products page page title contains ‘Products’ Reset filters total of products > 0 Create disabled product Product created Go to stocks page Page title contains ‘Stocks’ Filter by status = disabled New product created is displayed in list Go back to products page and delete product Product successfully deleted

item.title: Display products below low stocks level first
Help card
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Stocks page The Stocks page well displayed Click on Help The documentation modal is opened in English Close the modal The modal is well closed
